A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I read some of the user reviews before I saw the movie\, and boy were they all right. The movie is just not good. From useless new characters\, to plot points leading no where\, to original characters not getting their due\, to uneven action pacing\, this movie is truly a hot mess. Clearly designed with young audiences in mind that do not know anything about the original saga\, I can see why so many movie goers felt the need to express their anger and disappointment in the reviews here.
